attributes.additional_details: Because due to Covid we have missed half of year 10. When we have come back in year 11 we still have many teachers of and supplies teaching things they don’t know about themselves. This means we aren’t being taught the correct stuff
attributes.background: Decide if it is fair for us to do them in these circumstances

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
